articles.author: Taylor Lyles
articles.title: Sony Announces PlayStation VR2 PC Adapter for August - IGN
articles.description: Sony has revealed the all but confirmed PC adapter for the PlayStation VR2 headset alongside an August 2024 release date.
articles.content:
Sony is releasing an adapter on August 7, 2024 which allows its PlayStation VR2 virtual reality headset to work on PC.
After announcing incoming PC support for the headset in February, a PlayStation… [+3036 chars]

articles.title: Windows feature that screenshots everything labeled a security “disaster” - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft’s new Recall feature in Windows 11 has generated privacy and security concerns. One security researcher says it’s a potential “disaster” for cybersecurity.
articles.content:
